sentences.en: "Take a seat," he said in a bored tone.
After a while, I got bored and left.
sentences.cn: 过了一会儿，我觉得无聊，就走了。

sentences.en: After sixteen years of marriage they have grown bored with each other.
sentences.cn: 结婚16年后，他们已经渐渐彼此厌倦了。

sentences.en: Anna tried to look interested. Actually, she was bored stiff.
sentences.cn: 安娜努力装出感兴趣的样子。实际上，她腻烦透了。

sentences.en: But Fred was bored and desired to go home.
sentences.cn: 但弗雷德觉得很无聊，想要回家。

sentences.en: Dickie bored him all through the meal with stories of the Navy.
sentences.cn: 迪基吃饭时一直在讲海军的故事，让他不胜其烦。

sentences.en: He moped around the office for a while, feeling bored.
sentences.cn: 他在办公室闲荡了一会儿，感到百无聊赖。

sentences.en: Helen's small-mindedness bored and disgusted her.
sentences.cn: 海伦的狭隘思想让她深感无聊和厌烦。

sentences.en: His eyes bored into her, paralysing her, robbing her of movement.
sentences.cn: 他双眼凝视着她，令她全身瘫软，不能动弹。

sentences.en: I am getting very bored with this entire business.
sentences.cn: 我开始对这整件事情感到非常厌倦。

sentences.en: I bored a hole so that the fixing bolt would pass through.
sentences.cn: 我钻了个孔，好让固定插销穿过去。

sentences.en: I dropped out of high school. It bored me to death.
sentences.cn: 我从中学退学了，那种学校生活令我烦得要死。

sentences.en: She had begun to be a little bored with novel writing.
sentences.cn: 她开始对写小说有些厌倦了。

sentences.en: She was bored with the deadening routine of her life.
sentences.cn: 她厌倦了自己生活令人窒息的一成不变。
男孩子们开始感到厌烦。

sentences.en: The children quickly got bored with staying indoors.
sentences.cn: 孩子们在屋子里很快就待不住了。

words.tran_cn: 钻孔；使厌烦；挖空（bore的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 螺旋钻孔桩；填充桩；螺旋桩

trans.tran_en: tired and impatient because you do not think something is interesting, or because you have nothing to do
